trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ014_02648_SEQ_00<tab>This charming man is quite panicked.
TEXT_STMBDZ014_02648_TODO_00<tab>Slay the bear attacking the foolhardy man.
TEXT_STMBDZ014_02648_PANICMAN02648_000_000<tab>You there! Please, help my friend. He's been set upon by a bear!
TEXT_STMBDZ014_02648_PANICMAN02648_000_001<tab>You'll find him to the west of here.
TEXT_STMBDZ014_02648_PANICMAN02648_000_003<tab>You'll find my friend to the west of here.
TEXT_STMBDZ014_02648_PINCHMAN02648_000_010<tab>That was a little too close for my liking. Thanks for saving me.
TEXT_STMBDZ014_02648_PINCHMAN02648_000_011<tab>You were asked to help by my friend? Would you head back and tell him I'm safe? I need to catch my breath first before I try to go anywhere.
TEXT_STMBDZ014_02648_PINCHMAN02648_000_020<tab>Please head back and tell my friend I am safe.
TEXT_STMBDZ014_02648_PANICMAN02648_000_030<tab>He is safe? Phew, I could not be more relieved. We often have no choice but to venture outside the village in search of wild plants.
TEXT_STMBDZ014_02648_PANICMAN02648_000_031<tab>If only the bleeding earth we stand upon was more hospitable. We'd never have to put ourselves in such danger.
TEXT_STMBDZ014_02648_PANICMAN02648_000_032<tab>Regardless, all that matters is that my friend is safe. Thank you.
